title: Radical Candor Ep. 1: What is Radical Candor?
description:
Too many of us feel that a boss has to choose between caring personally or challenging directly, when in fact a boss can and should do both. Kim and Russ explain how they learned this lesson the hard way. They also share concrete tips on how not to make the same mistakes they have. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
